blocking_reasons.title: Ambiguous intent
blocking_reasons.detail: The topic leaves room for multiple interpretations, so an AI answer may not match the user's real goal.

blocking_reasons.title: Missing context
blocking_reasons.detail: No location or industry anchor is provided, so the answer will stay generic and less trustworthy.

blocking_reasons.title: Unstated answer format
blocking_reasons.detail: The topic is not phrased as a question, so the AI must guess the answer shape.

recommended_fixes.description: Rewrite the topic to name the exact action or decision you want (e.g., 'How to choose X for Y outcome').
recommended_fixes.why_it_matters: Explicit intent lets the AI choose a fitting reasoning path instead of guessing.

recommended_fixes.description: Add location or industry qualifiers so the answer uses relevant constraints and examples.
recommended_fixes.why_it_matters: Grounding the request reduces generic output and improves trustworthiness.

recommended_fixes.description: State the desired answer format (checklist, steps, ranked picks) and the decision criteria.
recommended_fixes.why_it_matters: Format cues help the AI organize the response and avoid irrelevant details.

score_explanations.message: Ambiguous intent reduces confidence because The topic does not declare whether the expected answer is informational, navigational, or transactional.
Missing context reduces confidence because No location or industry anchor is provided, so the answer will stay generic and less trustworthy.
Unstated answer format reduces confidence because The topic is not phrased as a question, so the AI must guess the answer shape.
Weak authority signals reduces confidence because There are no qualifiers (e.g., timeframe, data points, audience) that would signal reliability.

prompt_intelligence.intent_mismatch: AI cannot tell whether the ask is informational, navigational, or transactional.

structure_issues: Topic is not framed as a direct ask, so the AI must infer the question.
Topic is very short, which weakens clarity of the expected answer.
No industry or domain anchor is provided.

blocking_reasons.title: Ambiguous intent
blocking_reasons.detail: The topic does not declare whether the expected answer is informational, navigational, or transactional.

blocking_reasons.title: Missing context
blocking_reasons.detail: No location or industry anchor is provided, so the answer will stay generic and less trustworthy.

blocking_reasons.title: Unstated answer format
blocking_reasons.detail: The topic is not phrased as a question, so the AI must guess the answer shape.

blocking_reasons.title: Weak authority signals
blocking_reasons.detail: There are no qualifiers (e.g., timeframe, data points, audience) that would signal reliability.

recommended_fixes.description: Rewrite the topic to name the exact action or decision you want (e.g., 'How to choose X for Y outcome').
recommended_fixes.why_it_matters: Explicit intent lets the AI choose a fitting reasoning path instead of guessing.

recommended_fixes.description: Add location or industry qualifiers so the answer uses relevant constraints and examples.
recommended_fixes.why_it_matters: Grounding the request reduces generic output and improves trustworthiness.

recommended_fixes.description: State the desired answer format (checklist, steps, ranked picks) and the decision criteria.
recommended_fixes.why_it_matters: Format cues help the AI organize the response and avoid irrelevant details.

recommended_fixes.description: Include a grounding signal such as timeframe, audience, or data proof you expect the AI to cite.
recommended_fixes.why_it_matters: Authority cues signal that the answer should be supported, not speculative.
